channel.title: Customs
channel.description: CLIENT. how do i add customs? and how do i make what it looks like? and how do i make it go into my hand if its a weapon instead of my body? whoever helps me with all 3 gets rep :).

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

For adding customs, you will need a sprite editor, packer, unpacker. Please follow the link below:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

As for making it go into your hand, you will simply make it wieldable with the correct wield position in the ItemsWieldableDef.xml file. If it’s appearing on the body, look for an item that wields to the hand and use the same wield position.

If you need anymore help, don’t hesitate to contact.

Read full topic

item.title: Customs
item.dc:creator: @magnum magnum
item.description:
@magnum wrote:

to edit what it looks like you need to make a sprite which yo can use the sprite packer. I am going to make a tut with the sprite packer tomorrow so just standby
What the hand thing is what animation or wield spot like i think “6” is for chain
